gui.config.title: CraftPresence - Configuration Settings
gui.config.comment.title: Current Version -> %1$s (Schema v%2$s)
gui.config.comment.title.general:
General settings for display info
gui.config.comment.title.biome_messages=Customize messages to display with biomes
 (Manual format: biome_name;message)
 Available placeholders:
 - &biome& = Biome name
 - &icon& = Default biome icon
gui.config.comment.title.dimension_messages=Customize messages to display with dimensions
 (Manual format: dimension_name;message)
 Available placeholders:
 - &dimension& = Dimension name
 - &icon& = Default dimension icon
gui.config.comment.title.server_messages=Customize messages to display with servers
 (Manual format: server_Address;message;icon)
 Available placeholders:
 - &ip& = Server Address
 - &name& = Server name
 - &motd& = Server Motd
 - &icon& = Default server icon
 - &players& = Server player counter
 - &playerinfo& = Your in-world player info message
 - &worldinfo& = Your in-world game info
gui.config.comment.title.status_messages: Customize messages relating to different game states
gui.config.comment.title.advanced: Customize additional settings of the mod
gui.config.comment.title.accessibility:
Customize accessibility settings of the mod
 Includes:
 - Language Id
 - Keybinds
 - Additional Gui customization options
gui.config.comment.presence_settings: Customize the format and location of messages in the Rich Presence.
gui.config.message.editor.value.name: Value Name:
gui.config.message.editor.color.value.al:
Alpha Color Value
gui.config.message.presence.generalArgs=General message formatting arguments:
* Placeholders configurable in status messages and other areas
* Some placeholders are empty unless they are assigned

 - &MAINMENU& = The main menu message, while in the main menu
 - &MCVERSION& = The Minecraft version label
 - &BRAND& = The Minecraft branding label
 - &IGN& = The non-world player info message
 - &MODS& = The message displaying your mod count
 - &PACK& = The pack's message, if using a pack
 - &DIMENSION& = The current dimension message
 - &BIOME& = The current biome message
 - &SERVER& = The current server message
 - &SCREEN& = The current Gui Screen message
 - &TILEENTITY& = The current TileEntity (block/item/armor) message
 - &TARGETENTITY& = The current targeted entity message
 - &ATTACKINGENTITY& = The current attacking entity message
 - &RIDINGENTITY& = The current riding entity message
gui.config.message.presence.iconArgs=General icon formatting arguments:
* Placeholders configurable in status messages and other areas
* Some placeholders are empty unless they are assigned

 - &DEFAULT& = The default icon, specified in config
 - &MAINMENU& = The icon used in the main menu
  * Use this instead of &DEFAULT& to only show the default icon in the main menu
 - &PACK& = The pack's icon, if using a pack
 - &DIMENSION& = The current dimension icon
 - &BIOME& = The current biome icon
 - &SERVER& = The current server icon
gui.config.message.character.notice: Notice on syncing\n\n Syncing may not yield accurate results on older Minecraft versions
gui.config.message.credits:
This Configuration Gui was made from scratch by
 Jonathing, and will continue to be maintained by
 CDAGaming. A lot of effort went into making this
 custom Gui, so show him some support! Thanks.

 Feel free to learn from this Gui's code on
 the CraftPresence GitLab repository.

gui.config.comment.button.sync.config: Synchronize any live changes made from craftpresence.properties\nWarning: This will overwrite any changes made in here if unsaved!
gui.config.comment.general.client_id: Client ID used for retrieving assets, icon keys, and titles
gui.config.comment.general.default_icon: Default icon\n (Used in main menu, dimensions and servers)
gui.config.comment.general.detect_curse_: Enable detection for Twitch/Curse manifest data?
gui.config.comment.general.detect_multim: Enable detection for MultiMC instance data?

gui.config.comment.advanced.split_charac: The split character for the arrays in CraftPresence's messages configs
gui.config.comment.advanced.refresh_rate: The time to take in between refreshing the Rich Presence display and modules, in seconds
gui.config.comment.advanced.round_size: The amount to round certain variables within the Rich Presence display, as an Integer
gui.config.comment.advanced.include_extr: Whether or not to allow the Per-Gui System to scan additional classes\n (Warning: Can cause compatibility issues with other mods)
gui.config.comment.advanced.enable_comma: Allows CraftPresence to utilize commands\n (Enables Command Gui in main Config Gui)
gui.config.comment.advanced.enable_per_g:
Allows CraftPresence to change it's display based on the Gui you're in
 Note the following:
 - Requires an option in Gui messages
 - Minecraft's Guis must be opened once before configuring due to obfuscation
gui.config.comment.advanced.enable_per_i: Allows CraftPresence to change it's display based on the item you're holding\n Note the following:\n - Requires an option in item messages
gui.config.comment.advanced.enable_per_e: Allows CraftPresence to change its display based on entity data\n Note the following:\n - Requires an option in a valid entity message list
gui.config.comment.advanced.render_toolt: Allow CraftPresence to render hover tooltips (when available)
gui.config.comment.advanced.format_words: Toggles automatic capitalizing of words and general formatting with strings
gui.config.comment.advanced.debug_mode: Toggles Developer Mode, showing debug features and enabling debug logging\n\nOverridden Status -> %1$s
gui.config.comment.advanced.verbose_mode:
Toggles Verbose Mode, showing more detailed logging as well as stack traces and deeper exception messages

Overriden Status -> %1$s

craftpresence.message.unsupported: This feature is not supported in this version of Minecraft
craftpresence.command.usage.main:
§lCraftPresence - Sub-Commands:
 §rSyntax: §6/<cp|craftpresence> <command>

 §6§lreboot §r- Reboot RPC
 §6§lshutdown §r- Shut down RPC
 §6§lreload §r- Reloads CraftPresence data based on settings
 §6§lrequest §r- View join request info
 §6§lexport §r- View export commands for mod data
 §6§lview §r- View a variety of display data
 §6§lhelp §r- Views this page
craftpresence.command.usage.view:
§lCraftPresence - View Sub-Commands:

 §6§lcurrentData §r- Shows your current RPC data, in text
 §6§lassets §r- Displays all asset icons available
 §6§ldimensions §r- Displays available dimension names
 §6§lbiomes §r- Displays available biome names
 §6§lservers §r- Displays available server addresses
 §6§lscreens §r- Displays available Gui names
 §6§litems §r- Displays available item names
 §6§lentities §r- Displays available entity names
craftpresence.command.usage.view.assets:
§lCraftPresence - View Assets Sub-Commands:

 §6§llarge §r- View Discord assets with size LARGE
 §6§lsmall §r- View Discord assets with size SMALL
 §6§lall §r- View all Discord assets
craftpresence.command.usage.export: §lCraftPresence - Export Sub-Commands:\n\n §6§lassets [clientId::%1$s] [doFullCopy::%2$s] §r- Exports Assets from the specified Client ID in text or asset form
craftpresence.command.export.pre: §6§lBeginning export of %1$s Asset(s) from Client Id %2$s with Full Copy Status as %3$s
craftpresence.command.export.post: §2§lCompleted export of %1$s Asset(s) from Client Id %2$s with Full Copy Status as %3$s
craftpresence.command.export.exception: §c§lCommand Exception - Unable to export assets from Client Id %1$s
